channel.title: soul on Jesse Ward
channel.description: Recent content in soul on Jesse Ward

item.title: The Sofa Sessions I
item.description: The Sofa Sessions mix series focuses on the soulful side of electronic music. Styles ranging from Acid Jazz, Downtempo, Drum and Bass, and Hip-Hop. Music with soul, music to lounge to. Volume I - Nod your head, tap your feet.. Perfect listening for a lazy sunny Sunday afternoon. A mix of downtempo and jazzy hip-hop, inspired by the Mushroom Jazz mix series.
